block.p: Baby Boy for the Blairs Cherie Blair, the wife of Prime Minister Tony Blair, gave birth to a boy, Leo, the first baby born to a serving prime minister in 152 years.
PAGE 8
Baby Boy for the Blairs Cherie Blair, the wife of Prime Minister Tony Blair, gave birth to a boy, Leo, the first baby born to a serving prime minister in 152 years.
PAGE 8
Jean-Pierre Rampal Is Dead The flutist, who enjoyed enormous success as a touring soloist and took the flute to new levels of popularity, died in Paris at 78.
PAGE 44
Death Penalty Moratorium Gov. George Ryan of Illinois says he doubts that he will lift a moratorium on executions before the death penalty system is improved.
PAGE 20
Sealy Killed in Crash Malik Sealy, the former St. John's star who played eight seasons in the N.B.A., died in an automobile accident in Minnesota.
SPORTSSUNDAY
Judging the Tonys A special section examines the awards that are a celebration and an occasion for soul-searching on Broadway.
ARTS & LEISURE

Settings of British History Was Richard III really such a bad guy? Some who gather at Bosworth Battlefield say no. And how enchanting can the English countryside actually be? The Malvern Hills offer an answer.
TRAVEL
Consumers Without Shame In ''Bobos in Paradise,'' David Brooks describes the new dominant class, Americans with the money of the bourgeoisie and the tastes of bohemians.
BOOK REVIEW
Completely Candid Camera This summer, TV loses all its inhibitions, with real people living round the clock under total surveillance.
MAGAZINE
Bed-Stuy's Brownstones With as many as 6,000 row houses, and flanked by more expensive neighborhoods, Bedford-Stuyvesant has attracted buyers.
REAL ESTATE
Lines in the Sand Reconciling Jerusalem's borders to political realities.
